== Perumbavoor (CT) (627961) ==

Perumbavoor (CT) is a town in the [[Kunnathunad]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 6.89 sq. km. and harbouring 2272 households with total population of 9185 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 21 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 265 km. Male population is 4543 and female population is 4642. Scheduled Caste population is 1014 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the town is 627961<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 35 km. Railway station is at Aluva at a distance of 16 km.
